verses.verse: To the chief Musician <WH5329> <WH8764>, A Psalm of David <WH1732> the servant <WH5650> of the YY <WH3068>. The transgression <WH6588> of the wicked <WH7563> saith <WH5002> <WH8803> within <WH7130> my heart <WH3820>, that there is no fear <WH6343> of 'Elohim <WH430> before his eyes <WH5869>.
For he flattereth <WH2505> <WH8689> himself in his own eyes <WH5869>, until his iniquity <WH5771> be found <WH4672> <WH8800> to be hateful <WH8130> <WH8800>.
The words <WH1697> of his mouth <WH6310> are iniquity <WH205> and deceit <WH4820>: he hath left off <WH2308> <WH8804> to be wise <WH7919> <WH8687>, and to do good <WH3190> <WH8687>.

He deviseht <WH2803> <WH8799> mischief <WH205> upon his bed <WH4904>; he setteth <WH3320> <WH8691> himself in a way <WH1870> that is not good <WH2896>; he abhorreth <WH3988> <WH8799> not evil <WH7451>.
Thy mercy <WH2617>, O YY <WH3068>, is in the heavens <WH8064>; and thy faithfulness <WH530> reacheth unto the clouds <WH7834>.

Thy righteousness <WH6666> is like the great <WH410> mountains <WH2042>; thy judgments <WH4941> are a great <WH7227> deep <WH8415>: O YY <WH3068>, thou preservest <WH3467> <WH8686> man <WH120> and beast <WH929>.

How excellent <WH3368> is thy lovingkindness <WH2617>, O 'Elohim <WH430> ! therefore the children <WH1121> of men <WH120> put their trust <WH2620> <WH8799> under the shadow <WH6738> of thy wings <WH3671>.
They shall be abundantly satisfied <WH7301> <WH8799> with the fatness <WH1880> of thy house <WH1004>; and thou shalt make them drink <WH8248> <WH8686> of the river <WH5158> of thy pleasures <WH5730>.
For with thee is the fountain <WH4726> of life <WH2416>: in thy light <WH216> shall we see <WH7200> <WH8799> light <WH216>.
O continue <WH4900> <WH8798> thy lovingkindness <WH2617> unto them that know <WH3045> <WH8802> thee; and thy righteousness <WH6666> to the upright <WH3477> in heart <WH3820>.
Let not the foot <WH7272> of pride <WH1346> come <WH935> <WH8799> against me, and let not the hand <WH3027> of the wicked <WH7563> remove <WH5110> <WH8686> me.
There are the workers <WH6466> <WH8802> of iniquity <WH205> fallen <WH5307> <WH8804>: they are cast down <WH1760> <WH8795>, and shall not be able <WH3201> <WH8804> to rise <WH6965> <WH8800>.
